clinical_study.brief_title: Hypothalamic Function Before and After Bariatric Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Hypothalamic Morphology, Neuronal Activity and Systems Biology in Response to Food Intake in Obese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Compared to Obese and Lean Controls

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of gastric banding or gastric bypass on hypothalamic morphology and function, gut hormones and systems biology in obese subjects with and without type 2 diabetes.

intervention.intervention_name: Roux en Y gastric bypass and lap. gastric banding

intervention.description: 3 months of using the prodimed diet

study_pop.textblock: Obese (type 2 diabetic or not) population from primary care (dietary intervention) and hospital setting (bariatric surgery)
